rpgonline.world.img

Class WorldFromImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • rpgonline.world.chunk.ChunkWorld
      • rpgonline.world.img.WorldFromImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    World

    public class WorldFromImage
extends ChunkWorld

    A world type that stores world data as images.

    Colors in this class are interpreted including alpha. Any alpha value that isn't 0xFF with be intepreted as nothing.

    Author:
    Tomas

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorldFromImage

        public WorldFromImage(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Tile> registry,
                      long ix,
                      long iy,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> mappings,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> biomes,
                      int size,
                      java.io.File f)
        Constructs a new WorldFromImage object.
        Parameters:
        registry - The tile registry for interpreting tile IDs.
        ix - The X offset to offset world data by.
        iy - The Y offset to offset world data by.
        mappings - The mappings from colors to tile IDs.
        biomes - The mappings from colors to biome IDs.
        size - The size of one image in the world data.
        f - The folder containing world data.
